HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The specific shipping cost is communicated to the buyer before completing the order.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Only for items marked with the 'doprava ZDARMA' (free shipping) label.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Up to 30 days from the conclusion of the purchase contract. An indicative date is shown during the order process.
HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: Determined at checkout. Not available for orders over 20,000 Kč.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The specific shipping cost is communicated to the buyer before completing the order.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Up to 30 days from the conclusion of the purchase contract. An indicative date is shown during the order process.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: Determined at checkout. Not available for orders over 20,000 Kč.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: The specific shipping cost is communicated to the buyer before completing the order.
PARCEL_SHOPS.cod_surcharge: Determined at checkout. Not available for orders over 20,000 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: The specific shipping cost is communicated to the buyer before completing the order.
PARCEL_LOCKERS.cod_surcharge: Determined at checkout. Not available for orders over 20,000 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: 10 stores across the Czech Republic and a central warehouse in Prague.
IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Free if the item is in stock at the selected store. A fee may apply for transferring goods between stores. Pickup at the central warehouse in Prague is 59 Kč if paying on pickup.
IN_STORE_PICKUP.cod_surcharge: Payment is made on pickup. A 59 Kč fee applies for pickup at the central warehouse in Prague (Tomíčkova 2287/9) if paying on pickup.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers home delivery for standard and bulky items, delivery to parcel shops and lockers, and in-store pickup.
PROVIDERS: Standard home delivery and pickup points are handled by PPL and DPD. Bulky items are delivered by TOPTRANS and Geis CZ.
PRICING: Shipping costs are calculated and displayed at checkout. Free shipping is available only for items explicitly marked 'doprava ZDARMA'. In-store pickup is free if the item is in stock at the chosen location; otherwise, a transfer fee may apply.
RESTRICTIONS: Cash on delivery (COD) is not an option for purchases exceeding 20,000 Kč. Bulky and heavy items cannot be delivered to parcel shops or lockers.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Customers can pick up orders at any of the 10 UNI HOBBY market stores in the Czech Republic.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is not located on a dedicated page but is detailed within the general Terms and Conditions (Obchodní podmínky). While comprehensive, finding the information requires navigating a lengthy legal document, which is not user-friendly.
